Articles.Content:
Hi everyone! Been a fan of KSP forever, watching streams and videos but have just been too busy to play it properly until now. Look forward to exploring!

And i did my first Mun landing last night! Still have to get back home tonight. Fuel is going to be tight but i think I'll squeek by.

Congrats on your first Mun landing!

And welcome to the Forums!

I hate you so much right now!! I was able to land one guy on the moon but destroyed his engine upon landing. Later I accidentally killed him while attempting a rescue. Since then I never seem to have enough fuel lol.
